meanings.sent1: The innovatory idea sparked excitement among the team.
meanings.sent2: Her innovatory approach to problem-solving impressed her colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The innovatory recipe for spaghetti ice cream left everyone curious.
meanings.sent4: His innovatory thinking was like a breath of fresh air in the stale room of ideas.
meanings.sent5: The innovatory design of the building made it stand out from the rest.
